department: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)
short_summary: program evaluation, performance measurement and results, and special studies/reviews
description: The purpose of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is to establish a Standing Offer Agreement for the Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED) for professional services in the areas of: program evaluation, performance measurement and results, and special studies/reviews.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement
=====================

**Title**
--------

* English Title: Evaluation, Performance Measurement and Special Studies/Review Services for Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)
* French Title: Services d’évaluation, de mesure du rendement et d’études spéciales/d’examen pour Innovation, Sciences et Développement économique Canada (ISDE)

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* Reference Number: cb-8455-2489846
* Amendment Number: 16
* Solicitation Number: ISED208357
* Publication Date: August 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)
* Amendment Date: October 10, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2026
* Tender Status: Expired

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

* UNSPSC Code: 80101606 (Project Monitoring and Evaluation)
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

* Contracting Entity: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada
* Address: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H5, Canada
